values:
he asked me to move in with him. im not ready. so i guess laurens stuck with me a little longer. i understand she wants me out..but i dont want to move in elsewhere just because i feel like they want me out of the house here right now.. i dont think that would be a smart decision.

so much going on..shawns moving into an appt across the lake. yada yada. yep.

school is absolutely in-sane. oh well. ill live.

what else??

seizures. erm. hmm.. the walk was a success... almost time for MN and Chi-town. woot!!
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/8032.html

the walk for epilepsy awareness was a huge success. 16,000$$+ was raised. i cant wait for next year.

im stressed with schoool. tons of stuff going on.

frustration.

aye.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/7881.html

i survived finals. i passed both of my classes. my gpa took a leap of faith and went up in bounds which is fantastic. 

im pretty much a happy camper.

almost 21.

tada!!
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/7592.html

life has its good... and its bad...

im thrilled.. usually... dont get me wrong im at a great place in my life right now... i think. i have a great boyfriend.. and im in school.

but im not where i want to be. not where i wanted to be. i wanted to have already declared my major, to be well on my way to graduation, to have a fantastic gpa...to know where i was going in life, to... so many things. and i dont and im not. and it bothers me.

and it bothers me that when i look back on my life so far i have so many regrets. and that i keep telling myself ill change and that ill live my life differently so that from this day forward i can look back and not feel that way... but its never any different...

what no one realizes.. is that i have to work so much harder for even the little accomplishments than they think i do. lauren... she skates through school.. it comes so easy for her. me? i work like crazy and still dont do as well as id like to.

i dont know.. 

busy with finals. busy with shawn. weve been out alot lately. 
had an eeg the other day. and the one day i should have had seizures- i didnt. frustration.

im just... i dont know.. one of those days maybe??
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/7306.html

canada was great. we had a bunch of fun.

mom and lauren came too- they ended up staying in our hotel.. i got the name wrong so we ended up together lol. but i didnt know that until i got home on sunday night. 

niagra falls was amazing. we went to the guiness book of world record museum, to the falls, and to the hard rock cafe. and to this sports bar by our hotel ((and tim hortons for breakfast lol)).

in toronto we went to see phantom of the opera, and another hard rock ((plus ran by the hard rock in new york on our way home)). and walked around down town and all that fun stuff. we had a blast. 

it was a fantastic trip. i had a blast. cant even begin to explain it all. it was just- ... wow.

anyway. thats it for now.

more later.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/7139.html

lots going on.

ill update later.

lauren went to santa fe,
semesters almost over.
boyfriends home

tons going on
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/6811.html

crazy few days.

im an aunt again!! for me, this makes number 3, for my sister, number 1.

ive got a neice, 2 nephews, and another nephew due this may!!
needless to say im thrilled.

maybe i should explain how this is divided up-

my step sister- just had my nephew
my best friend ((we will call her sister though))- has my other nephew and neice, and another one on the way.

i have a ton of pictures of all of them. i think im going to make my sister a collage for her birthday. or something.

my boyfriend is in germany- im not sure if i mentioned that already or not. but he is. which is nice because i can actually talk to him on the phone now. im lovin it. im getting addicted to to calls though- soo spoiled. ive refilled my phone card more times than i can count. hopefully i get another call soon.

spring break started. im procrastinating. have a ton of homework to do.. and i just cant focus. its disgusting.

i started having seizures again- well i had them a couple weeks ago, then they stopped and then thursday or friday they came back full force. i think its because of stress because im having tons!! but i see the dr on the 16th so.. we shall see.

my sister.. aww shes crazy but i love her anyway. shes so random.. i love it...

anyway. i need to scoot for now. but, more soon. very soon.

..i like shiny objects

~
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/6559.html

"hello erin, i am a ton of bricks and i will be hitting you right....
... NOW"

yes. that ton of bricks hit me, and has landed all over me.
and, it seems, is pushing me farther and farther into the ground.

after 3 weeks and 1 day of taking my medication like i was supposed to, missing MAYBE 4 doses ((but never any in the same day, and im sure 4 is an overstatement))

they came back. ive had SO many seizures in the last few days.
i dont know what to do.
im so..
so so many things.
angry, frustrated, upset, pissed off... 
and a billion other things.

none of which i can do anything whatsoever about.
i was ready to start hitting pillows or.. anything 
but could.. or did i?
no. i just curled up my fists.
cried like crazy
 ((ive cried for at least 3 hours between today and yesterday about it))
and just.. 
very very quietly
freaked out.

and still am.

i dont know what to do.
i dont know..

i cant even think straight.


so. where do i go from here?

all i want right now. is to hear my boyfriends voice. to tell him whats going on and to have someone tell me not to worry and that everything will be okay.

to talk to .. oh hell i dont even know.

and then
THEN
my dad, goes skiing the other day- was supposed to take me to an appt friday ((which ended up being sat)) but came over at 1230 to ask if he could drop me off early, at like 1 ((the appt was at 4)). so i told him no- since i was still doing homework, and in my pajamas. called mom. then called kyle to see if he could drive me, who thankfully could.

so then dad tells lauren today that he cant take me to school tomorrow either like he ALWAYS does. how very kind.
didnt give me any warning, i dont think i would have known had lauren not asked him.

*MENTAL SCREAM* 
i dont know what to do.
ugh.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/6207.html

he made it safely. and called me on valentines day, and then every day since. he got me an international phone card, and when he called me today he gave me the numbers i need to use it. hes calling me again tomorrow. i cant wait.

my phones broken. waiting to get my new one in the mail, then get it activated. hopefully ill have a phone by tuesday but until then my mom is letting me use hers.

im drowning in homework.

ugh.

-sigh- i guess thats all for now.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/5906.html

I woke up this morning, and immediately wished i could go back to sleep. i was having such a good dream..
have you ever had one of those dreams, that is so good, so real, so perfect.. that all you want to do is go back to sleep.. back to the dream??

thats what happened this morning. i was having such a good dream. and it was so perfect.
im not sure why but i was at the airport, really early- way before the time my boyfriend was supposed to fly in to come home. so for some reason i was there.. with my mom or something, and all of the sudden someone called my name..i turned around and it was my boyfriend. telling me he had told me he was on a later flight so he could surprise me. and i swear the hug lasted forever.

i woke up this morning and it took me 5 minutes to realize that it wasnt real. -sigh-

there is only one month between separating now, from the month he comes home. march.. thats the ONLY thing in the way. so how do i make it go faster? i dont know what im going to do. time seems to be coming to a halt.

maybe, once i can call him and talk to him whenever i want, it will help. but i sort of wonder if it will just make me miss him more. aye!!

---

then.. i had a dr appt today. and he said something about the neuros notes, so i asked him what they said. and the words out of his mouth.. i almost started crying.. i dont know which was worse.. being pissed off or being sad too. 
"so what did his notes say?"
"that this is something you are going to have to deal with for the rest of your life. and you will always be on medication. that you cant stop taking your medicine just because you arent having seizures. just because you think you are better"
"yea but they could go away right?"
"not likely erin. this is something you will have forever"
"but.. okay it would have been ok to lie"
"no it wouldnt have"
"-angry look- fine what else did they say?"
"will likely never drive"
"EXCUSE ME??? never???"
"id love to see him eat his words, but.. you have to go 6 months without a seizure"
"but ive been taking them for 2 weeks.. im 2 weeks closer... ive never taken them for 2 weeks straight"
"i know that.good job."

ugh.
then i had to talk to him about the ocd. since my other dr cant give meds. but everything he was going to give me would have upped my chances of having seizures.
so i asked if any of them would make me gain weight "all of them have a chance of doing that"
"never mind then i dont want it. i dont want something thatll make me gain because then ill stop taking them and itll be a viscious circle"
"at this point because you arent having seizures id rather not put you on anything at all."
"okay."
"but CBT is an option. like your other dr said"
"i dont like popping my comfy bubble."

i guess that just about sums up the day. 

maybe talking to my boyfriend will make it better.. or anyone. i refuse to accept that this could be a forever thing. and that i will always be on meds. and the chances of not driving. NO!! i absolutely will NOT.

so now what?
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/5647.html

i had my chem test on friday. i thought everything i studied would be the important stuff. i didnt study my notes because from what it sounded like, the worksheets and in class work were what was important. so, those 5+ ((back and front by the way)) pages of notes .. i didnt look at.
i went in to the test praying i would be oaky, i spent 20 minutes on the phone with my best friend to see if she could help me.
i failed the test, i dont have the grade but i failed.. i know. ive never felt so clueless on material as i did that day. im crazy upset- failure is NOT okay. it is not acceptable. at least not for me. i keep crying.. im soo disappointed in myself.

the rest of the weekend has been kind of okay.

there was something good that happened though- so friday.. when im in tears because of my test, all of the sudden maybe 10 minutes later, i got a text message from my boyfriend. :) and we got to talk online and with texts for like 2 hours. so i was excited.  we have our trip all planned. everything is booked. we're set to go. granted its not for a couple months, but still. and airport day is almost here!!

-sigh- i guess thats all for now.. im still kinda bummed and all that crap.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/5391.html

yes. i most certainly DID get my eyebrow pierced earlier today.
and i am BEYOND thrilled.

its still sort of on the low.. my parents dont know and neither do many of my friends- id rather wait.. and suprise them.
my sister knows. and the girls that went with me, my bestfriend, my boyfriend, and a couple other people.

oooo im soo happy
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/5210.html

not so sure i agree with that ((though the quote does go on to say that thats why we close our eyes when we cry, kiss, and something else i cant remember)). though kissing is good lol. im quite fond of that. *mischievious giggle*. but what about love? cant that be seen, in some ways?? and a bunch of other "best things".

i am counting the days until my boyfriend is on his way home. i miss him sooo much. i just keep thinking about being in his arms. and about hearing his voice, im just a little ways away from hearing his voice outside of a voicemail and i am sooo excited.

the only thing is- valentines day. we wont get to spend that together. so im trying to figure out something special to do. ((when we planned originally we were going to be together for v-day cause he was sposed to be back so i was going to go visit him but.. plans change. and he got extended, and school started and yada yada)). i think i am going out with the girls that night.. and i have class but i want to do something great for him too.

lent starts soon. i have to figure out where im going to get my ashes ((and what im giving up.. eeek)). figuring out what to give up has been the hard part because i keep thinking of things, and losing them lol. so far::
-chocolate
-colored soda
-fast food
-television??
im still trying to think of some more. woo hoo.

im drafting out my tattoo and praying i get brave enough to go get it lol. debating a new piercing too. but i havent decided what to get done ((ideas??))

new semester started, please excuse my lack of updates, thats why. this semester is eating me but its okay ill make it work :)

anyway. i spose thats all for now but theres another update on the way coming up
<3
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/5065.html

classes started today, i have a full schedule. its almost gross.

mon- writting (12-2), intro to phys/anat (3-6)
tues- history to 1877 - US (10-12)
wed- writting (12-2), abnormal psych (6-9)
thur- history to 1877- US (10-12)

so yea. busy.
and to add to it i still have the flu. gross, right? all i want to do is sleeeeep. but unfortunately im a little more hyper now. its just a matter of time i guess.

im ready for the semester to be over, and it only just started. maybe because it didnt start as stellar as i was hoping it would have. -sigh- oh well.

lets see.. what else...
talked to my boyfriend today.
and im going to see lauren at school on..friday i think??
since the poor kid keeps asking me to.

i miss last semester.
gracie and drew
it was so fun.
-sigh- if only.

theres still some hope for this semester.
guess i should go. kinda sleepy. 
<3
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/4729.html

what exactly does it mean when someone tells you to stay beautiful??
i mean.. im sure theres only kind things but... stay beautiful??
is that sort of a double edged sword ((ex- youre beautiful.. but?))

ramble ramble.

classes start tuesday.  i cant wait. but im sure i wont be saying that come a few weeks from now.

i cant wait for my boyfriend to get home. im so excited. not so sure my sister is though.

she and i are going for ice cream tomorrow i think.. itll make her smile.

im waiting for a call from the neuro department too still. hopefully they call me tomorrow. and i can schedule an appt as a new incoming patient.

this year has good things written on it.

im getting ready to transfer, getting applications, getting ready for spring break..

i just wish i had the confidence in myself, that only a few other people have in me.
wish i believed in myself to the point where i can declare my major.
i know what i want to do
just after being told that i cant for the last while- i question myself.
and i hate it.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/4429.html

i tried changing my cartilege ring last night, to no avail. i ended up sticking the original earing back in and deciding to attempt again later. soo maybe ill be able to get it today. but im not sure if ill be successful or not. crossing my fingers.

stayed up late last night to see if my boyfriend got on- no such luck. also no such luck for this morning. later tonight maybe. itll give me a good reason to stay up- i can clean while i wait.

greys anatomy is on tonight! and its new!! hurrah. think im going to order pizza and watch it ((mondo cals. but thats okay i havent eaten much today. and i weighed in this morning at a low so .. its okay for tonight.. then back to working extra hard)).

i hope i get a hold of my boyfriend. i cant wait.

so.. anyway.. i guess i should go for now. more soon though
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/4349.html

so.. i know its been a little bit.

i finally heard from my boyfriend. if i didnt mention that already. 
i cant wait to see him. i miss him sooo much.

im..eh... its been a bad night. it was okay.. until a little bit ago.
...i dont have much to say.

later
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/4030.html

i heard from my boyfriend today. thank god!! i woke up with the strangest sense of calm i have ever had. logged online and ta-da there were messages from him!! yay!! 
so im staying up late tonight so maybe i can catch him online.

ive been feeling really wierd all day long. tingly- everywhere. and my head feels really funny... not sure whats wrong with me.intake today though has been pretty good.

went out with friends tonight. had a blast.

going now to im not sure what
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/3480.html

we're stuck all snowed in to santafe. its pretty crazy. 2 feet of snow.

still no news from my boyfriend. im trying to think positive. but i had 3 really bad dreams the other night that something happened. i am soooo scared. it sounds crazy.. but i dont know what id do without him.

im using my christmas present from him when i get home. hes such a sweetheart. i told him he didnt need to get me anything but he did and he went all out. silly.

going crazy not having a scale here. my sister keeps saying i have an eating disorder... rawr.
anyway.. i better scoot

thoughts and prayers for my boyfriend would be hugely appriciated.
and hopefully ill be home in 2 days.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/3219.html

Im in santa fe right now **pictures soon**.

Its been interesting. Great though- my step sister is pregnant and ive gotten to see a little of her ((my sister has spent the most time with her)). So its been lots of fun.

Worried though- I havent heard from my boyfriend lately. Am actually sick with worry ((more yesterday.. ive calmed down a little but i dont know how long itll last))

Have to make an appointment with a new neurologist when i get home. and a bunch of othr things.

ive been feeling really wierd lately... not sure why ((my right arm and hand. and left hand have been allll tingly...))

anyway.. gotta jet but more soon.
xo
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/3064.html

something seems... off.
ive been feeling really out the last few days- on the brink of tears all the time, i feel like theres a brick on my chest, everything just seems so... not right?
but the wierd thing is- everything IS right. things are great with my boyfriend and i, i passed my finals, my family is all fine and doing well, my friend is out of the hospital and recovering... everything is fantastic.

i have NO reason to feel the way i do.. but for the last couple of weeks- i have. i dont have anything to say, im overly easily frustrated and upset, it takes almost nothing to turn me to tears, and that brick on my chest feeling has been really bothersome.
i cant figure it out.... i just know- i dont feel okay. and i havent felt like this in a long time.
and i dont know what to do :( 

so.. whats wrong with me? 
--
then, a friend told me im in denial about having epilepsy... heh. though the discussion was left unfinished.. but still. and here i thought i was all out of denial and shit.
--

i dont know what to do. im having a panic attack. im in tears. im just...
ugh.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/2654.html

im operating under the thought process "no news, is good news". hopefully he will be home from the hospital today. but i wont know anything until someone calls me. still really worried.. but trying to calm down some. we talked a ton yesterday and he sounded good soo we'll see.

i got to talk to my boyfriend last night that was great. i hadnt talked to him in a few days... but its been forever since ive heard his voice. hopefully, ill get a call on christmas, id be thrilled!! :excited: but talking to him was great. we talked about when he gets home. and he got that christmas package i sent over so thats great. he said he loves what hes gotten so far (some parts he has to wait til christmas for). hurray! im soo glad he liked it.

hes pretty sure the present he sent me will make it before i leave. if not its something to come home to. im so excited. **i wonder what it is**

jens coming over tonight. tomorrow we are getting our hair done, shopping, tons of stuff. we are starting downtown and will probably get to the mall around noon or so shop there and maybe go to a movie. hurray.

weight wise..making progress. lost what i gained. im back on track.

my "friend" and i ended our friendship. we are no longer speaking or... anything. took each other off myspace... though comments id left her had long been deleted by the time the removal came around. its crazy. im so angry and frustrated, but i dont want her to get hurt either. so then the question becomes- if someone says something about her.. what now? ive been defending her.. trying to make it so she wont get hurt.
but shes the one that ended this too.. maybe i shouldnt invest the energy into it?? let her make her own mistakes, afterall, isnt that what she wants?
im lost.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/2482.html

ohmy. what an insane night. 

things hit the fan. officially. with an ex friend of mine. the friendship was ended. which is a little frustrating, because i would have liked to have salvaged something.. just needed a break. i dont know. after relatively recent events.. i just.. whatever happens happens. im not wasting my time. 

i cant wait to see my boyfriend. im hoping i can talk to him today. or tonight. i miss him like crazy. soon though. 

i am soo glad- finals are DONE. i took my last one this afternoon. now im done til the start of jan. 
i sold back one of my books.. i bought it brand new for 77.00 and got 38.00 back.. sooo im going to see if i can find somewhere else to sell them. ideas? 

thats all for now. im really worried about another friend of mine so.. im just....going to go find something to keep myself bsuy.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/2219.html

So I was talking to my boyfriend earlier. Which was great. I missed him like crazy. But I got a great suprise, when he comes home in march to visit me.. he gets to stay for good!!! im so excited.
yay!!
im so frustrated. things are.. gagh!! things are going so ... badly? with a "friend" of mine. i am ready to scream. aye.. im so frustrated. i dont even know what to do anymore.
mental scream!!
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/1985.html

i was soo terrified for that math final today. yikes! so i studied- hard. then went and saw my professor. and it was off to take the final (after making up some work i hadnt finished). i needed at least a 73% to pass the class. so it was all or nothing since a 71% is passing. i was soo scared. but i ended up getting an 80 (which may go to an 83). i am soo excited.
huge sense of relief.

jens coming to visit. hopefully for an overnight this weekend. its a crazy busy weekend though. jen, sposed to go out fri to celebrate the end of finals, xmas party saturday, grandmas sunday. but it was the only time we could fit. oh well.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/1555.html

my friend and i arent speaking anymore. its like theres a huge wall between us. we were close... at one point in time. now.. were like total strangers.
its..ugh. but im sick of being treated the way she treats me. im sick of feeling like im under her. like im not good enough.
its.. nuts.
i dont know. its just so beyond frustrating. and stressful.
gagh!!!!
i dont know.. im trying to censor myself and leave some things out.. but... ill revisit it later.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/1305.html

So, i went into school today planning on taking my math final. however, that is definately NOT how it worked out. i found out im failing the class, by 4%, so i decided to wait and take it tomorrow after i have studied some more and can pass with a higher score. eeeek.

i went christmas shopping today after school. got moms present, and carolyns *hehe carolyn. im finally set*. im excited. i get to see carolyn on sunday. hurrah!! we havent seen each other in an eternity lol.

things with my friend.. are pretty crazy. we are hardly talking. okay we arent talking. i wonder if two people, as opposite as we are.

im going tomorrow night to study for my sociology exam. woo hoo.

my boyfriend should be back, safe and sound very soon. i miss him like crazy. i will be sooo thrilled when he gets home.
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/1214.html

aye. my very first entry lol. like 3 other blogs wasnt enough. but i plan on cancelling the others so hey.

lets see.. whats there to tell...

im 20 years old.
a sophomore in college.
dating an amazing guy. hes a soldier. and i love him.
i have epilepsy.
i constantly forget my meds.
i want to work in medicine, or health and human services. 
i believe in karma.
and im horrifically addicted to myspace.
i cant wait to move out (because im still at home).
im random, crazy, and a billion other things. but ill do anything for the people i care about.
mostly.. im just me.

i guess for now thats it. ill do a real entry tomorrow from school while i wait for my appointment with disability services. but i figured something here was better than nothing... so far.?
http://sweetpeame86.livejournal.com/726.html

its crazy. so much happened yesterday.

our neighbors had a gas leak *sort of*, and the emergency number for maintnance (we live in an apt) was disconnected. i hope we never have an emergency lol.

then tonight, there was a power outage (just a few minutes ago).
i should be sleeping. i have to get up in just a few hours to go to main campus for a meeting with disability services, and to take my math final (this WILL be ugly). 

the only truely horrid thing about finals week.. is that it means i will almost definately forget my AEDs. im so busy, it takes a phonecall from someone to remind me to take them (which is probably the only reason i remembered them today). but hopefully after finals week, ill be all set. the really frustrating thing, is that people i know feel it necessary to point out when i have seizures (ive caught them on many occasions). and its soo frustrating. if people know (since i have such little seizures), should be my decision. who i want to tell should be up to me.. not someone who sees me have one, and feels like broadcasting it. because it only makes me feel more ashamed. and less like anyone else. i mean, like it hasnt been shoved in my face a billion times already with how i should change my major because of them and mom telling me i needed life insurance to ride a bike. and a million other ways. gagh!

i guess i should go, either study or sleep... i need to do something, and make sure i remember my meds tomorrow or im asking for trouble. 

it seems nuts, that saturday is my 5 month anniversary with my boyfriend. its come up so quickly. its insane. i cant wait for him to come home. i miss him soooo much. we're going on a trip, to canada when he comes back ((still looking for people to go with us though)). i cant wait. im not sure how long he will stay for, i guess it depends on how many leave days he has left, and how long he feels like staying with the amount given. im so excited. im worried though. but i dont think that will stop until he gets out of iraq. i miss hearing his voice, but at least ive got the voicemail that i can replay over and over.

im soooo not ready for this test tomorrow. yikes!! hopefully ill be able to study when i get to school ((though chances are ill get online from class and update)).

okay- last, i promise.
i found this online... and i love it, so i thought id post it.

You complain that your boyfriend/ husband has worked late all week and have barely seen him
*I look forward to the two weeks a year we spend together

You complain b/c he doesn't call you enough
*My heart is thankful for the 15- second phone call I got last Tuesday in the middle of the night!

You whine to you friends about how much you miss him already because he is on a two day trip with his parents
*I haven't seen him for 7 months now

You don't fee like making love tonight because you are too tired
*We will stay up all night because we don't know when it will be the last time

Your boyfriend/husband belongs to you
*Mine belongs to the government

Your boyfriend/husband is training for his game next weekend
*My boyfriend is trained to kill

It's just not practical for you to drive an hour to see him every weekend during school
*He spends $700 dollars on a plane ticket just to see me 2 days

You hate hanging up the phone when talking to him
*My heart breaks because I won't talk to him for another 10 days

You complain that He doesn't take enough time out of his life for you
*My man has to get up in the middle of the night to talk with me because of the time difference. He doesn't complain

Your man is in a bad mood from not sleeping much this week
*My man ran 10 miles this morning at 4 in the morning and has a full day of work ahead of him.

Your boyfriend/husband can call in sick when he is tired or not feeling well
*My man works no matter what.

You don't trust him so you follow him places to see if he is telling the truth
*I have no choice but to trust him and even then I trust him with my life.

You don't like him talking so sexually with his friends
*My boyfriend/husband has to chant it in drills

You check your phone, see you missed a call from him, and decide to call him back when you aren't so busy
*I see a missed a call and cry because I don't know when he can call again.

You might save a cute voice message from him
*I save them all b/c it helps me to remember what his voice sounds like.

Being apart for a month to you seems daunting
*A month apart for me is a wish that can't come true

You wouldn't change schools to be close to him
*I have to move to another country to be with him

You have every part of him memorized
*I study pictures so I don't forget what he looks like

You can choose to be patriotic of not
*I HAVE to be patriotic or else make him look bad

You take your time together for granted
*We don't

Your cell phone bill was high this month from talking too much
*He pays 20 cents a minute to call me

You love that fancy necklace he bought you
*I refuse to take his dog tags off, and not a day goes by that I dont have them on...

You can't understand how much it hurts, but you also can't understand how incredible it feels to finally be with them

You say you miss him
*Times that by 20
